channel.title: Releases / WIP
channel.description: Anything related to releases or works in progress are posted here.

item.title: Devastation: Active Members

item.content:encoded:
A little heads-up regarding who is actually working on Devastation. Everything's sorted into neat litle categories (me being the organized person I am... ).

Devastation: Active Members

item.title: Devastation: Private Forum?
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
Reciprocity has gone ahead and asked about a private forum at UnrealSP.org. It's possible to do, but we need 5 active members, minimum, in order to set it up. Judging by the activity lately, I don't think that's a problem; but it more relies on what everybody thinks about it.

Myself and Reciprocity already have accounts at UnrealSP. Usage of the private forum there would require registration, and I'm not sure how many people would be "inconvenienced"...

Devastation: Private Forum?

item.title: Devastation: Groups
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
The following is a (more or less) comprehensive list (including descriptions) of ALL groups involved at some point in Devastation. As always, this info is debatable.

It takes a lot of time to write detailed histories, so it's likely that all the groups listed won't be written about (yet).

--------

Contents

1 -- Humans
2 -- Skaarj
3 -- NEG
4 -- EAM
5 -- EMTO

--------

1 -- Humans

Humans have populated the planet Earth for roughly 2400 years. For centuries, they have fought amongst...

Devastation: Groups

item.title: Devastation: Public Storyline
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
Since the private forum doesn't exist (and I have serious doubts that it ever will), I guess all the info and ideas passed around is public, but even so...

This is what I intend to have as the public storyline. This will be, esentially, what the player knows before even starting a new mission.

This original post is what was in the last team-wide e-mail. It is posted here for reference and refinement.

--------

The human-Skaarj war has long since ended. The last skirmish was in...

Devastation: Public Storyline

item.title: Perfect Dark mod: Public Beta V3
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
Related Mod: Perfect Dark mod
Release Type: Public Beta
Release Version: V3

Changelog:
Code:
- Ammo changed to a large box; color indicates the type
- Ammo sharing
- Changed CTF to Capture the Case (with 4 team support!)
- Cleaner code
- Eliminated PDFX.utx file
- Eliminated weapon/ammo caches in maps
- Expanded Pop a Cap options
- General game settings tab
- Ladder support
- Map list support
- Mod menu eliminated
- New AI rating system for weapons
- New Gametype:  King of the Hill
-...
Perfect Dark mod: Public Beta V3

item.title: Using this Forum
item.author: invalid@example.com (MrBond)
item.dc:creator: MrBond
item.content:encoded:
Greetings, all! This is the forum for anything pertaining to releases or WIPs, including all manner of public and internal Beta, Alpha, and Full releases, as well as screenshots and other WIP media.

As such, the following guidelines should be followed:
1) Do not request info here. Any info you would like should be directed, via e-mail, PM, or otherwise, to the specific author. If you are unsure which author to contact, contact me (mrbond113), and I'll relay your request to the proper...

Using this Forum
